name: Pandemic Dominator - Board Game Assistant - Legacy
name_original: Pandemic Dominator - Board Game Assistant - Legacy
description:
Never be surprised by an Epidemic again!

Pandemic Dominator remembers everything so you don't have to! It is the only Pandemic board game assistant on the market and will do amazing things to your game.

Look, Pandemic's hard enough as it is. The stakes are high, and every turn is precious.

Let Pandemic Dominator keep track of how many red cards are left, which Infections are coming up next, and how many turns are left in the game.

If you're playing Pandemic Legacy then you DEFINITELY need Pandemic Dominator! Don't risk rioting a city or losing a Research Station because you didn't realize an Epidemic was coming up. Pandemic Dominator will scream it at you!

Playing with 6 or 7 Epidemics in the deck? Forget about it without Pandemic Dominator! You don't have time to make a single mistake, so bring PD along for the ride.

Pandemic Dominator supports the "On The Brink" expansion with options for the Mutation Challenge and Virulent Strain.
